name: Zero-G Strength Block
description: Core, grip, and proprioception sessions tailored for crews living without a deck under their feet.

cards.title: Elastic Core Triads
cards.description: Perform plank, anti-rotation, and leg-raise holds using resistance loops anchored to the module walls.
cards.summaryText: Cores keep posture honest when gravity is gone.

cards.title: Grip Endurance Ladder
cards.description: Cycle through increasing-duration grip squeezes while translating across handrails.
cards.summaryText: Grip endurance is the first thing to fade without gravity.

cards.title: Lower-Body Tether Presses
cards.description: Anchor boots to resistance platform and execute controlled squats and lunges to maintain bone loading.
cards.summaryText: Lower-body loading preserves bone density through long deployments.

cards.title: Spatial Orientation Maze
cards.description: Navigate a 3D maze of labeled targets while rotating your body frame 90Â° each segment.
cards.summaryText: Mobility plus cognition equals low-error movement in zero-G.

cards.title: Breathing Under Load
cards.description: Pair resistance work with paced breathing to maintain oxygen efficiency.
cards.summaryText: Breath discipline keeps strength work sustainable in microgravity.

cards.title: Neuromuscular Reaction Drills
cards.description: Catch and redirect velcro cubes launched from random vectors to train reaction speed.
cards.summaryText: Reaction drills keep hands fast when floating chaos hits.
